name: King's Court: Definitive Edition
description:
Alternia is a world inhabited by youths and ruled by one heiress and one heiress alone. At least, she thinks she's the only one. Sitting high and mighty in her mansion, she is unaware of the trouble brewing beneath her feet. 

Artios Rolaya, the disenfranchised heir to the thrown, intends to take his position back. This is the story of the people he gathers to support this goal, his court.
